TopicTitle: Nuka Corp shuttle project ( and apparently other stuff :D )

Articles.Content:
That one I will remodel. Do not like the look of the scramjet intake. Thinking of just removing it totally. And will improve the interior to fit more the future plan for IVA.

Ok. thank you for the information, I hope that it will be even in this millennium.

Ãou probably have looked at the shuttle from every angle more than once, Anariaq. We on the forum only can judge by the render shots you\'ve posted. On the basis of those pictures i hope that you won\'t remove the scramjet intake. By removing it, the shuttle probably will appear sleeker and faster, but as it is now, it radiates strength and power. Perhaps, i\'m the only one who finds the shuttle attractive as it is now, perhaps many more think so to.

You got a point. Will see when I get there. Probably gonna keep it now. ( after all I am lazy too )

Ok. thank you for the information, I hope that it will be even in this millennium.

Rofl hope it will

little update for the rescue pod.

Dos it look to boring? what color could be cool on this one. I am out of idea. Looks like it is lacking something because of white color.
How bout the danger stripe like the 1m fuel tank has and grey with a steel texture with rivets and ect.

Amazing work! I really like all that detailing you\'ve done.

I\'d say perhaps a red and white paint scheme for this pod?
That grey it is right now and blue painted 'accents' I think it would give it a distinct appearance.

Since it\'s a rescue pod, I would say half orange, half white.

There\'s a rescue craft retexture for orbiter DGIV, I think it has been made by 'Frenchbiscuit'. If you find it you could have a better idea of what i mean. Search on DanSteph\'s page

That grey it is right now and blue painted 'accents' I think it would give it a distinct appearance.

Hope you meant Access. That I least used

Took all suggestions And mixed it together. Will keep the red and white. From the front looks like my national flag

Since it\'s a rescue pod, I would say half orange, half white.

There\'s a rescue craft retexture for orbiter DGIV, I think it has been made by 'Frenchbiscuit'. If you find it you could have a better idea of what i mean. Search on DanSteph\'s page

Looks really great. Maybe I should make a little texture pack kinda thing after releasing it
You are a very creative person
I\'m loving that rescue pod. I\'m thinking you could do a version that\'s just a regular capsule too. You\'re a great modeler. Looking forward to seeing more!
loving the pokeball texture! lol. great work though. Any chance of a test release of anything some time soon? would love to get involved in ballancing parts for you
I Love the new Rescue Pod Texture, Looks BadS.

I\'m super excited about those pods... Can\'t wait

Not to sidetrack you even more, but do you have any plans for space station modules?

You are a very creative person

Haha first time I heard that. Thanks

I\'m loving that rescue pod. I\'m thinking you could do a version that\'s just a regular capsule too. You\'re a great modeler. Looking forward to seeing more!

There will be more. I have a tendency of having more Ideas than I can make hence why there are suddenly so many project I have started. And still have different ideas.

loving the pokeball texture! lol. great work though. Any chance of a test release of anything some time soon? would love to get involved in ballancing parts for you

Rofl the pokeball pod Do need some balancing test after I have finished it. Do not really know how to balance it my self. So when test version comes out. Please do.

I Love the new Rescue Pod Texture, Looks BadS.

Thanks.

I\'m super excited about those pods... Can\'t wait

Not to sidetrack you even more, but do you have any plans for space station modules?

I have ideas about space station parts. But right now I want to see when docking comes out. See what limitation there is. And then Ill take it after that. But at this moment the idea is to have them 3 maybe 4 meter in dia. and 12 meter long. But will not start modelling them till Im sure what I actually can build.

And a question. I am in the process of figuring out exporting it. Dos any have an idea how to make the access port door work? and ladder. I have no idea how that is sat up in a model.

Anariaq if you get some time I have an idea for a new shuttle, I was thinking of a kerbalized version of the Dyna-Soar 1 kerbonaut. I dont use mods and I think it would look excellent if it fited in with the KSP 1m Stock parts mainly because of the Kerbal look.

I would love to get my hands on all your vehicles. they look awesome.

Could you make a tutorial video on how you make your projects? ;D
Do you mind releasing your Kerbonaut model? I certain it would be really useful for a lot of people.

Do you mind releasing your Kerbonaut model? I certain it would be really useful for a lot of people.

At page 18 there is the download link. Though do not want to add it at my release page. Because I am not 100% sure that it is to scale, and it also need the rcs backpack.

Also I have learned a lot from making those pods. Something I did not have thought about making the shuttles. So I will use the microshuttle to experiment with the new things. To see how hard it is to use for a shuttle.

Hopefully there will be a highres soon.

Anariaq if you get some time I have an idea for a new shuttle, I was thinking of a kerbalized version of the Dyna-Soar 1 kerbonaut. I dont use mods and I think it would look excellent if it fited in with the KSP 1m Stock parts mainly because of the Kerbal look.

I will have time after I finish my own shuttles. So in a long time from now

I would love to get my hands on all your vehicles. they look awesome.

Could you make a tutorial video on how you make your projects? ;D

I always wanted to do a tutorial. Though do not have a mic that is good enough and I am really bad in english so I probably not make one.

I always wanted to do a tutorial. Though do not have a mic that is good enough and I am really bad in english so I probably not make one.

I\'m sure something can be arranged to circumvent those things. There are many users here who have a good mic and are fluent in english. If you can give a good description of every scene you film, it should be possible to make a good tutorial.

Something I did not have thought about making the shuttles. So I will use the microshuttle to experiment with the new things. To see how hard it is to use for a shuttle.

Even if it\'s just for testing, could you release it ? I like the 'micro' style of it

I\'m sure something can be arranged to circumvent those things. There are many users here who have a good mic and are fluent in english. If you can give a good description of every scene you film, it should be possible to make a good tutorial.

The problem is that all of us works differently. So the way I work is best explained by me.

Even if it\'s just for testing, could you release it ? I like the 'micro' style of it

Yes will do.

And bad news so far. I can not use the same work for the headshield like I do with the pods.

I will need to figure out a new way to make the headshield for shuttles.

EDIT:

Tried out another way to make them, really time consuming. And for the final look. It is not worth it. Will try something else.

And I am the only one that thinks it is odd that we have not heard anything from the dev team?

Great work ! I love the small 'bee'

I think they are on a well deserved vacation after 0.16 release !

And I am the only one that thinks it is odd that we have not heard anything from the dev team?

Nope. Nothing odd at all. They usually go quiet for a week or two after an update is released and the big bugs are snuffed out while they take a few days off and start putting together their plans for the next phase. We should see something from them this week.

Nope. Nothing odd at all. They usually go quiet for a week or two after an update is released and the big bugs are snuffed out while they take a few days off and start putting together their plans for the next phase. We should see something from them this week.

Yes, but last time they updated the part tools before taking a break. That is the problem so far. I can not export any of my models before they update the part tools.

And gave up on the little shuttle. I think it was more that the base model is really bad. And made one of the most chaotic UV ever but it worked.

EDIT:

Added some color to the shield.
